text: The Roots of Heaven is a 1958 American adventure drama movie directed by John Huston and starring Errol Flynn, Juliette Gréco, Trevor Howard, Eddie Albert, Orson Welles, Paul Lukas, Herbert Lom, Grégoire Aslan. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * Category:1958 adventure movies Category:1958 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Movies about animal rights Category:Movies about tigers Category:Movies about elephants Category:Movies about hunters Category:Movies set in Africa
title: The Roots of Heaven
